page.title: 04FINANCE IN AMMANFORD
page.content: Ammanford has many financial establishments. Five banks:- Midlands, Nat West, Lloyds, Barclays and T.S.B. are represented, having an average of nine employees in each. Seven Building Societies are found in the town but each shares a building with other businesses eg. Abbey National shares with a Solicitor's office, the Alliance with a Chartered Accountant. Each Building Society office is small, with an average of four employees. Within the study area there are seven Sub-Post Offices (at Betws, Saron, Pantyffynon, Tir-y-Dail, Parcyrhun, Penybanc and Tycroes), and one central office at Ammanford.This last Post Office is being modernised at present.
